app_detail:
H Band is your companion app for your smart accessories. The easy synchronization with your smart watch allows you to track all your activities. H Band creates a data history for you, so even after weeks you have a detailed overview over your past exercises

if you have problem,see the youtube video

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzdhUKsYfSYWXmk2CwGaZjw
H 밴드는 여러분을 위해 데이터 히스토리를 생성하므로 몇 주 후에도 과거 연습에 대한 자세한 개요가 있습니다.

문제가 있으면 youtube video를 참조하십시오.
